room_title: Escape room "The Missing Detective's Office" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: Our family had a fantastic time in The Missing Detective Room! We were able to just barely escape and laugh about it after. Chuck was very helpful in the booking process and gave us a great restaurant recommendation! Would definitely recommend this activity for something unique and challenging

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Detective's Office" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: Having never done an escape room before we didn't know what to expect, but days later we are still talking about it! The experience is unique, and the "Missing Detective's Office" has little hints of Canton's history scattered throughout! We really loved our experience and will absolutely be back for more fun! To those looking for a new experience - this would be great for families with kids of all ages, couples, groups of friends, and more. It is a great way to challenge your mind and enjoy a night out!

room_title: Escape room "The Missing Detective's Office" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: This is such a fun afternoon event to do with friends!! We had a group of 6 and then an extra couple was with us, we all jelled great. The staff were friendly, location is easy to find and the Detective's Room was a blast! I only wish they had more of these rooms to do! I can't wait to check out the new room.
